description.zh: 科技產業對電力供應的安全性,可靠性及電源品質的要求都極為嚴格,往往因一點點小事故引起巨大的災害而造成慘重的損失,電力事故已成為科技產業的重大風險之一,例如半導體工業,如何防範電力事故的發生及降低其風險機率是非常重要的課題,這些都有賴於良好的事故診斷技術及防治方法.本課程針對科技產業的供電電系統及設備常發生的事故及其原因進行診斷並提出改善方法, 範圍涵蓋科學園區主要的供電系統(特高壓地下環路供電系統)之線路及設備,以及科技廠家用戶內部供電系統及設備,內容包括常見事故型態介紹,事故原因理論分析及案例解說,以及事故的防治方法與可行措施.本課程旨在培育研究生建立電力事診斷的理論基楚,瞭解實務問題的面相,進而啟發思索改善對策,增進未來投入科技產業工作的能力,本課程的設計以研究所一學期為原則

Students will learn about the theories and models of human cognitive processing with the consideration of task and enviroment characteristics; and students will learn how to apply design processes and evaluation techniques for improving system performance.

description.en: This course will mainly introduce the past history, development and future trend of industrial engineering and management. It concludes industrial organization, personnel management, factory planning, cost analysis and control, R&D, production management, materials management, quality management and industrial safety.

name.en: Introduction to RFID and its application

description.zh: Radio frequency identification (RFID)是一種先進的自動辨識技術。它用於辨別、追蹤、排序和確認各式各樣的物件，包含有人、汽車、包裹、動物和貨物等等。相關的應用如門禁管理、車輛辨識、資產追蹤、存貨控制、動物晶片和工產自動畫。RFID依靠標籤和讀取器之間無線電波的頻率、電波，來進行辨別。本課程將介紹RFID之基本原理及其生活與產業上之應用。
description.en: Radio frequency identification, or RFID, is a generic term for technologies that use radio waves to automatically identify individual items. There are several methods of identifying objects using RFID, but the most common is to store a serial number that identifies a product, and perhaps other information, on a microchip that is attached to an antenna. In this course, the basic technology of RFID and its application will be introduced.

description.zh: 旨在探討系統化的服務系統設計與服務作業管理方式，其內容：服務業本質的瞭解、服務設計、服務系統規劃、服務廠址選擇、服務場所佈置、服務程序設計、服務自動化及電腦化、服務作業管理人員管理、設備管理、服務存貨管理、服務等候線管理、服務績效管理等。並輔以國內外績優服務企業之作業管理為案例討論。
description.en: This course mainly introduces the development, design and management of service systems. The contents include an introduction of service industry, service design, service systems planning, site selection, layout, service process design, service automation, service process management, facility management, inventory control, queuing, performance management. The case study on service management will be also included.

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討各種類型之神經網路，如逆傳遞網路，機率神經網路、學習向量量化網路、反傳遞網路、自述應共振理論、霍普菲爾網路、雙向聯想記憶網路、自組織映射圖網路等，此外相關文獻及運用之領域將深入討論。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to study the several ANN paradigm, such as Backpropagation, probability ANN, Counter-propagation, self-organization map. Hopfield network, BAN etc. Besides, the relative literature and applications will also cover.

description.zh: 作業研究是用來處理將有限資源分配於許多競爭性活動的問題上之一種有用的技術，它已經變成眾多企業工業機構的一種標準工具。基於線性規劃的基本知識高等作為研究提供一些有及可靠的運等方法來所決非線性規劃問題及機率模式。一些與實際應用有關的課題諸如有貨理論、等程理論、可靠度及決策理論等將在本課程中以討論。
description.en: This course discusses linear programming, network analysis, dynamic programming, game theory, (non) integer programming, Markov chains (Markovian decision process), queuing theory, inventory models, forecasting models, decision analysis and simulation.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。使學生瞭解科學研究的特性、研究的類型、測量的程序與工具、資料的收集、資料的分析、撰寫研究計畫的方法，在從事管理問題之研究與探討時，知道如何正確選用適當方法，並取得所需資訊。

We focus on：l Define marketing engineering and internet marketing plans.l Strategic marketing.l Tactical marketing.l Includes discussion, tips and techniques for combining   traditional marketing concepts with new web market methods.

description.zh: 本課程主要的目的是探討企業如何有效評估經營環境與競爭的本質並建立獨特而持續性的優勢，以啟動企業長期成長及獲利的引擎，利於不敗之地。
description.en: The objective of this class is to study the enterprises；business environment and the contents of computation effectively. To build up the unique advantage and pump the long-term groan profitable engine of the business is the main goal in this topic.

name.en: The Principles and Applications of Machine Vision

description.zh: 機器視覺檢測乃結合光學設備 ` 影像處理 ` 與電腦輔助計算處理 , 藉由擷取受測物影像之特徵進行後續各種應用(如檢測 ` 辯識等)。 為確保機器視覺應用之精確度及速度,受測物影像必須依用途進行不同前處理以突顯特徵 , 後以不同之演算法則判斷之擷取特徵是否符合應用要求。 機器視覺近年來大量使用於各產業,除提昇製造業之產品品質外,對人身安全認證之生物科技亦功不可沒 。
description.en: Machine vision has been extensively used in inspection and biometrics in recent years. This course provides the fundamentals and practical applications of machine vision for graduate students. Increasing the knowledge and capability in machine vision for a well-trained industrial engineer is the final goal of this course.

description.zh: 本課程之目的為使學生瞭解生產計畫與管制的基本概念，訓練學生對於生產計畫與管制的各項方法，制度設計及改善等具有基本認識，並應用管理科學及作業研究於生產計畫與管制之研究發展。本課程包括下列主題：生產計畫與管制概論、產品設計與發展、預測、來源需求規畫、生產排程、總排程、存貨管理、豐田式管理、專案規畫與管理等。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to introduce the fundamental concepts of production planning and control. In addition, applications of management science and operations research in production control and planning are also provided. This course is consisted of the following subjects: introduction, product design and development, forecasting, resources requirement planning, production scheduling, total scheduling, inventory management, Toyota management, and project management.

In addition to the textbook, key papers from the literature will be used.  Students should gain knowledge of the complexity of semiconductor operations, key issues to the operations, and approaches for solving the problems.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討用於單一時點資料和時間序列型資料的統計預測方法，預測技術涵蓋迴歸分析、時間序列迴歸、分解方法、指數平滑法、和Box-Jenkins 法。
description.en: This course is to study statistical forecasting methods for cross-sectional data and time series data. The quantitative forecasting techniques include regression analysis, time series regression, decomposition method, exponential smoothing and Box-Jenkins method.

In first semester, topics covered are mainly in the field of Mechatronic, Automatic, Systematic, MENS, etc. emphasizing in professional knowledge of Mechanical Electrical integration.

The contents of this courseare shown as follows :1.Introduction to Hardware-Software Co-design2.Ststem Level Design of Embedded Systems3.Design Representation4.Function Optimizations5.Function/ Architecture Optimizations6.Architectural Optimizations7.Hardware/software Co-synthesis and Estimation8.Function/Architecture Optimization and Co-design Flow9.Synthesis Results

description.zh: 以結構工程、大地工程、防災科學、運輸交通、營建管理、營建材料及營建技術為專題討論主題之主要範疇。

description.zh: 本課程旨在闡述專案工程規劃與控制之系統架構，主要介紹各種專案規劃與控制之方法及專案管理方法，內容包工程專案管理方法，專案工期規劃與控制，專案成本控制方法，專案資源管理，專案風險整合管理，專案品質管理，及專案人力及目標管理等介紹。

A method that rate of progress control.        Natural resources to allocate and the most suitable         schedule.        Cost accounting and cost control.        Complete cost/System control of time limit for a           project.

description.zh: 本課程主要係研討調查方法、穩定分析、坡地災害成因、坡地監測、防災及管理配套措施、以使同學了解山坡地工程於規劃設計及施工等階段，應如何進行減少災害和實行適當管理。
description.en: This course will focus on the site investigation ,stability analysis ,failure analysis ,in-situ monitoring ,disaster prevention  ,and risk management of natural slopes. It is designed to give students a better understanding of slope protection and slope management during various stages（such as planning，design and construction）of the slope development.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在於提供方法，用來分析任何型式的結構物受任意動荷重所產生的應力與變化。
description.en: The primary purpose of this course is to present methods for analyzing the stresses and deflections developed in any given type of structure whenit is subjected to an arbitary dynamic loading.

description.zh: 本課程為大學部地盤改良之一後續課程,進一步介紹比較重要和特殊的地盤改良工法之原理及其在土工和基礎施工方面之實際應用.此外,亦介紹與大地工程施工之安全與穩定具有密切關係的地錨工法和加勁土(補強土)工法.因此本課程包括下列各種工法之原理,設計及施工: 1.石灰穩定工法  2.水泥穩定工法  3.化學灌漿處理工法  4.凍結穩定工法  5.粉體噴射攪拌工法  6.碎石排水工法  7.地錨工法  8.加勁土(補強土)工法  9.地盤改良(穩定)工法之選擇.
description.en: This course introduces the principles and practical applications of the current and special method of soil Improvement in geotechnical engineering.In addition,as an important stability technique of soil slopes and soil grounds,reinforced earth method and ground anchor method are also introduced.Therefore,this course deals with the principle and practical application of following subjects;1.lime stabilization2.cement stabilization3.stabilization by grouting4.stabilization by freezing5.Dry Jet Mixing method 6.reinforced earth method 7.ground anchor method.

name.zh: 有限元素法在大地工程之應用
name.en: Finite Element Method in Geotechnical Engineering

description.zh: 有限元素法常被用來模擬基礎施工、開控支撐及山坡地開控的過程，預估土壤或岩盤的變形行為，研判或分析施工的安全性。本課程的內容除了講授有限元素法的基本理論，尚須以大地工程的案例作為實際推導公式理論之演練。其案例包括滲流問題、壓密沉陷問題及土石結構穩定分析等等。
description.en: Finite element method ha been widely used to simulae the process of foundation construction, cut and bracing and excavation etc, and to predict and analyze the construction safety. This course should include the basic theory and sfiffues matrix formulation, in addition, geotechnical engineering problem are in addition, geotechical engineering problems are used to help students to understand the basic theory and code formulation. These examle problems includes seepage, consolidation and earth structure stability analyses.

description.zh: 資料研析方法,水文統計與迴歸分析,小流域洪水推估(含基本水文系統實驗),基本水文系統實驗,頻率分析(2),水文演算,水力演算,降雨逕流模擬,地理資訊系統(GIS)結合地文單位歷線,序率水文模式,HEC-2,6講解與實習,專題討論.
description.en: Introduction,Data error analysis,Hydrological statistics,Frequency analysis,Stochastic analysis,Hydrological routing,Hydraulic routing,GIUH plus GIS,Small watershed flood prediction(including Lab.experiment),Seminar.

description.zh: 本課程是較大學部的「岩石力學」課程為之深入探討岩石行為的課程，將針對岩石的指數性質、透水性、強度及變形性做更詳細的研究，並將比較岩石和土壤的不同，以及介紹機率概念在岩石力學上的應用。上課時將以研究論文為主，，書籍、報告為輔，其涵蓋的課程內容大致如下：1、岩石的指數性質2、岩石和土壤的不同3、岩體分類法4、岩石的透水性5、立體投影圖6、岩石的強度7、岩石的破壤準則8、岩石的變形性9、弱面的分析10、機率在岩石力學上的應用
description.en: Compared to the undergraduate Rock Mechanics course, this is a more advanced course to examine the behaviors of rocks under different stress conditions。 It will focus on the index properties, the permeability properties, the strength properties, and the deformation properties of rocks。 In addition, it will address the difference between rocks and soils by contrast。 Finally, this course will introduce students to the concept of probability, and how it can be applied to the Rock Mechanics。 The students taking this course will have plenty of reading assignments, and are required to participate in the classroom discussions。

name.en: Special Topics on Geographical Information System

description.zh: 政府近年積極推動行政資訊化，應用資訊技術提昇行政的效率與品質，以達到便民及創新的效益。地理資訊系統(Geographical Information System，簡稱GIs)之開發與應用，即是提供各使用單位在處理大量圖籍與相關文字資料之管理與查詢的最佳解決方案；配合完整中文介面與印表技術，更可提高效率資訊服務。國內各重大工程在規劃設計時，正逐漸引用地理資訊系統。以其強大之資訊處理、整合、分析、及展示等功能輔助，如圖籍疊合與環框分析等，使工程規劃設計更為準確客觀，發揮工程最大效益。
description.en: To provide public service with better quality, the administration of government with information-based is widely established by adopting newly developed information technology.  Geographic Information System is one of the technology especially applicable when massive maps and attribute data are involved in management affairs.  It offers users a solution for information management and data query under a graphic environment with Chinese interface as well as output printing specification.  The planning and design of major construction projects in Taiwan were increasingly referred to GIS for the reason that efficiency can be maximized by the powerful data organization, integration, and display capability along with GIS.

description.zh: 線性空間分析，狀態方程式及響應，可控制性及可觀測性，穩定性分析，狀態回授及估測，控制器設計及應用，觀測器設計及應用，非線性系統，時變系統，控制理論的應用
description.en: Linear space Analysis, State equation and Response, Controllability and Observability, Stability Analysis, State Feedback and Estimation, Controller Design and Applications, Observer Design and Applications, Nonlinear systems, Time varying Systems, Applications of Control theory

description.zh: 最小平方法，最大可能法，自動遞迴模型，馬可夫參數估測，狀態空間實現，時域數據的系統判別，頻域數據的系統判別
description.en: Least Square Method, Maximum Likelihood Method, Auto Regressive Model, Estimation of Markov Parameter, State-Space Realization, System Identification based on Time Domain Test Data, System Identification based on Frequency Domain Test Data.

description.zh: 單自由度系統的自由及強制振動，多自由度統的自由及強制振動，自然頻率的計算與模態分析，連續體的振動，振動的控制，振動系統之數值分析方法，非線性振動及隨機振動
description.en: Topics include Free and Forced vibrations of single degree and multidegree of freedom systems, Determination of natural frequencies and mode shapes, Vibration of continuous systems, Vibration control, Numerical methods in vibration analysis, Nonlinear vibration and Random vibration.

description.zh: 噪音基礎，噪音分析實驗法，汽車噪音法規與標準，基本噪音控制程序，車輛噪音與噪音控制基本，引擎噪音與控制，車輛噪音源，車輛噪音與改良，心理聲學與最佳化
description.en: Fundamentals of Acoustics, Experimental Methods of Acoustic Analysis, Automotive Noise Legislation and Standards, Basic Noise Control Procedure, Basics of Vehicle Noise and Noise Control, Engine Noise and Its Control, Vehicle Noise Sources, Vehicle Noise and Its Refinement, Psychoacoustic Analysis and Optimizations.

description.zh: 流體動力與化學動力學，Rankine-Hugoniot 關係，擴散火燄與液滴燃燒，層流火燄，紊流火燄，引燃、焠熄、可燃極限，噴霧燃燒
description.en: Fluid Dynamics and Chemical Kinetics, Rankine-Hugoniot relations, Diffusion flames and Droplet Burning, Laminar Flames, Turbulent Flames, Ignition, Quenching and Flammability Limits, Spray Combustion.

description.zh: 1.輪胎模型 2.輪胎性能參數 3.穩態操控 4.暫態操控 5.四輪操控 6.乘坐舒適性分析
description.en: To provide an overview of ground vehicle handling and ride performance through the development, analysis and interpretation of vehicle models.  The course is divided into three major parts: Tire modeling, Handling, and Ride.  For each part, case study examples will be used to illustrate the important design considerations.

description.zh: 本課程將以車輛之傳動系統設計與分析為主要內容，傳動系統之定義為從動力源至驅動輪間之各項組合，其中包括離合器、加力箱、變速箱、差速箱、傳動軸與最終傳動等組合，由於每種車輛行車特性之不同，因此前述之各項組合有不同之排列方式，傳動系統設計之優劣往往影響到車輛之行車性能。本課程將從車輛行駛阻力推演出傳統系統設計之理念及方法，並針對如何發揮動力源之最佳特性，搭配良好之傳動系統設計以達到較佳之行車性能為主要教學之目的。
description.en: Introduction to the vehicle drive-train design and analysis. Topics include definition for drive-train system、clutches、transfer case、manual transmission、automatic transmission、differential gear、transmission shaft  and final driver.  Fundamentals of vehicle tractive resistance will deduce the methodology of drive-train design.  The good drive-train design will result in optimal vehicle tractive performance.

description.zh: 本課程之目標為增進研究生之英文閱讀能力與寫作技巧。介紹英文科技論文的慣用語法、用字與閱讀技巧，並分析撰寫英文報告與學術論文之章法與組織要領。
description.en: Objective of this course is to improve reading ability and writing skill for graduate students.  This course introduces grammar, terms and phrases that are frequently used in English technical articles.  Structures of English essay and thesis will also be explained.

notes: 上課教室視教中心302教室

description.zh: 本課程著重食品冷凍之原理、設備、儲存及應用技術，使學生深入了解食品冷凍之精髓。課程涵蓋︰（1） 食品儲存方式與設備。（2） 食品微生物理論（3） 各種食品之冷凍方式與原理（4） 工業食品冷凍系統（5） 食品冷凍運輸之方法和技術（6） 超低溫食品冷凍技術
description.en: This course is concentrated in the fundamentals facility storage and application technology of food refrigeration.  The students should be familiar with the principles of food refrigeration after these lectures.     The topics of this course are:(1) Food storage and equipment.(2) Food microbiology and refrigeration.(3) Refrigerating technology of various food products.(4) Industrial food freezing systems.(5) Distribution technology of chilled and frozen food.(6) Cryogenics in food refrigeration.

description.zh: 控制理論基礎，冷凍控制系統方式簡介，冷凍系統控制元件認識，冷凍循環運轉控制系統規劃，冷凍應用環境溫溼度及污染控制，除霜、防溼及防凍控制設計，冷凍應用節能控制系統規劃設計
description.en: Fundamentals of control logic, introduction to refrigerating control methods, controlled devices and controllers, control circuit design for refrigerating cycle operating, schematic design of space temperature, humidity and contaminants control, Defrost, frost and moisture control design, energy saving control system design

description.zh: 自動化應用基礎，自動化規劃設計︰1. 個體冷凍設備2. 冷凍系統運轉操作3. 冷凍倉儲管理自動化4. 低溫冷凍應用自動化
description.en: Fundamentals and design of automation applications include:1. Unitary refrigeration equipment.2. Refrigerating system operation.3. Refrigerated warehousing management.4. Low temperature refrigeration application.

description.zh: 本課程為研究所熱流科學基礎課程之一，內容主要包括質量、動量與能量守恆方程式的推導，以及它們的解析與近似解，應用範圍包含非旋轉流、低雷諾數流以及高雷諾數(邊界層)流等等。
description.en: This course is one of the fundamental courses in the thermofluid sciences for graduate students. Based upon the concept of conservation, the equations of mass, momentum, and energy will be derived. This course will deal with solutions of these equations, both exact and approximate. The application of solutions includes irrotational flow, low Reynolds number flow, and high Reynolds number (boundary layer) flow, etc.

name.en: Non-eelctric Power Air Cond. Energy saving Tech.

description.zh: 非電力空調節能技術在與傳統利用機械壓縮式系統比較下，具有實質提供冷熱與電力的低成本、高效率之最佳經濟上特性。本課程內容將涵蓋： 1.吸收式系統技術 2.各式燃料電池﹝Fuel Cell﹞的連結應用技術 3.氫氣引擎的應用 4.MHD-磁動力流體發電技術 5.各種非電力空調技術評估 6.系統的最適化設計
description.en: The overall purpose of Non-electric Power Air Cond. Energy Saving Technology: 1.The Concept of Absorption Heat pump tech. 2.Fuel Cell System integration with Cogen. Sys. 3.Hydro-engine utilization tech. 4.Tech.of M.H.D. power generation. 5.Evaluation Tech for Non-electric Power Air Cond. Sys. 6.Optimize Design of Non -electric Power Air Cond. Sys.

description.zh: 系統功能分析，空調系統設計概要，負荷計算理論，送風與風管系統分析，送水系統分析，冷卻水塔熱質傳分析，主機系統性能分析
description.en: System function analysis, introduction to system designs of air-conditioning, theories on cooling load calculation, air moving and duct system analysis, water system analysis, heat and mass transfer in cooling towers, performance analysis of chillers

description.zh: 本課程包含下列課題1.空氣清淨機構理論。2.無塵室構造、建造及確效。3.空氣過濾理論。4.無塵室設計專案。5.	論文研讀。
description.en: This course covers the following Topics.1.Theory of air cleaning Mechanism.2.Clean room configuration, construction and         verification.3.Air filtration theory.4.Paper discussion.

description.zh: 資訊管理是一門較新的管理學門，在電腦早期發展時期，只有專業電腦人員才會懂得如何操作電腦，但隨著資訊科技的進步，個人電腦的普及，一般非資訊人員也可以很容易操作與使用電腦。然而會用電腦不見的對企業有所幫助，思考資訊科技如何給企業帶來競爭優勢是資訊管理領域所考慮的重要議題。一般來說，資訊管理主要探討企業如何對資訊系統及資訊人員作最有效的管理，以其與企業目標結合，替企業增加競爭優勢。本課程即站在管理與策略的角度分析企業應如何對資訊資源（包括資料、資訊系統與資訊人員）做最有效的管理，上課方式將採用個案研討為主，以期學生能瞭解理論與實務的發展。
description.en: This course will discuss how the organizations gain their competitive advantage through Information Technology. It covers the following three major parts: Part 1:Information System Planning. Part 2: Information System Management in the Organization. Part 3: Strategic use of Information System Part 4:Electronic Commerce and strategic impact.

description.zh: 本課程在透過研討，讓學生瞭解行銷的觀念和趨勢。主要包括以下課題：（1）消費者行為（2）市場區隔（3）產品策略（4）行銷通路（5）網路行銷（6）促銷（6）關係行銷。
description.en: The course teaches the student marketing concepts and trends. The topics will be covered: (1) consumer behavior, (2) marketing segmentation, (3) product strategy, (4) marketing channels, (5) online marketing, (6) relationship marketing.

description.zh: 本課程旨在針對電子化企業經營與管理作探討, 其中包含: 1.電子化企業概論2.經營模式3.企業再造4.企業資源管理5.中小企業電子化6.	商業電子化7.供應鏈管理8.需求鏈管理9.協同預測管理10.個案研究
description.en: The purpose of the course is to discuss the e-business management. The contents of this course will include: 1.	General concept of e-business management2.The business model3.	Business reengineering4.Enterprise resource planning5.Small enterprise e-business management6.	Channel e-business7.Supply chain management8.Demand chain management9.Collaborative management10.	Case Study

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion.

description.zh: 本課程先以供應鏈之基礎理論為主題，之後輔以國內外製造業及流通業之供應鏈管理作案例討論。
description.en: This course firstly focuses on the fundamental theory of supply chain management. The case study on manufacturing industrial and retailing business will be also included.

description.zh: 本課程包含下列主題：網路商業環境和未來發展，網路行銷，網路公關，網路商店之經營，線上廣告及交易。
description.en: This course includes following topics: network commerce environment and future development, network marketing, network PR, network store management, on-line advertisement and business, and network business safty.

description.zh: 本課程利用要徑法教導學生管理一項專案有關時間及成本的估計，進度表，預算編列等技巧，及其它監督控制一項專案進行之措施。專案經理在一家公司組織內的地位和角色亦將加以討論。課程內容包含：（1）專案的定義和辨認，（2）專案可行性研究和選擇條件，（3）專案進度表編排，（4）專案之預算與成本控制，（5）限制性資源之編排與調配，（6）專案評核與檢討技巧。
description.en: This course introduces the technique of Critical Path Method (CPM) to manage a project in terms of time / cost estimation, scheduling, budgeting, and other control / monitoring measures on the performance of a project. The role of project manager in an organization will also be discussed. Topics to be covered are: (1) Concept and identification of a project, (2) Project feasibility study and selection criteria, (3) Project scheduling, (4) Budgeting and cost control, (5) Constrained resource scheduling and leveling, and (6) Project evaluation and review technique.

description.zh: 本課程可使學生瞭解：貨幣與資金市場、投資問題、如何取得資金與運用資金、使公司價值最大、使股東權益最大化、瞭解代理制度、瞭解公司股票、債務之利用，股利政策等事項‧
description.en: This course has provided: money and capital market、Investments 、How to obtaining and using funds、Maximize the value o their firms、How to maximize stockholders' stock、To know agency problem 、To know the price of the firm's stock, use of debt and dividend policy

description.zh: 多變量分析及處理二項以上變項的統計，分析技術、常用于管理，經濟，財務，會計等之分析‧課程內容：因素分析、主成份分析、複迴歸分析、區別分析、多變項異數分析典型相關分析、集群分析、聯合分析、直線方程式模式
description.en: Multivariate analysis is to analyze more then two variables simultaneously, and to be able to apply to management, economics, accounting…etc.The contents of the course:factor analysis, principal component analysis, multiple regression analysis, multiple discriminate analysis, multiple analysis of variance, canonical correlation analysis, cluster analysis, conjoint analysis, SEM…etc.

description.zh: 本課程在介紹如何運用企業內與員工之有關資源，包括其能力、知識、技術、態度和激勵，以配合企業整體競爭策略與形式。其內容有：人力資源分析、策略及目標、支援性作業之取得、發展及報酬、人力資源的維護。
description.en: This course introduce how to apply the resource of the inter-corporation and employee, such as capacity, knowledge, technology, attitude and incentive, in order to cooperate business integrate competitive strategy.

description.zh: 本課程教導及訓練研究生有關英文在管理領域內特定專題的溝通運用，學生將在本課程中以英文學習: (1)管理常見之專有名詞，(2)英語備忘錄的草擬與撰寫，(3)會議資料如：議程、動議、記錄等的準備與撰寫，(4)企業計劃書的編寫，及(5)現代化全球管理相關專題英文資料的閱讀與溝通討論。學生必須在課堂上就選定的管理題材以英文做報告與其它同學討論。
description.en: This course teaches students the communication in English on the special topics within the context of management. Students are expected to learn the followings in English: (1) Terminologies commonly used in management; (2) Draft and write-up of English memorandum; (3) Development of meeting materials such as agenda, motions, minutes, etc.; (4) Business proposals and plans; and (6) Contemporary topics and trend in global management issues. Students will be required to make group presentations and discussions on the selected management topics in English.

description.zh: 本課程目的在於幫助學生瞭解現代的投資理論與其對投資管理的應用。當您完成此課，您勢必對證券評價與投資組合管理有透徹的瞭解。您將具備基本的理論技能，使您得以瞭解現代投資學的發展，並且熟悉與投資有關的實務。本課程涵蓋下列主題：1) 投資組合概念：風險與風險規避、風險性資產與無風險性資產之間的資本分配、最適風險性投資組合。2) 資本市場均衡：資本資產定價模型、單一指數與多因子模型、套利定價理論、市場效率。3) 固定收益證券：債券價格與殖利率、債券投資組合管理。4) 權益評價模型。5) 投資組合績效評估
description.en: The goal of this course is to provide a basic understanding of modern investment theory and its application to investment management. When you finish this course, you should have a thorough understanding of security pricing and portfolio management. You will have basic theoretical skills enabling you to understand modern developments in investments and you will be familiar with investment practices. The course will cover the following areas: 1) Portfolio Theory: Risk and Risk Aversion, Capital Allocation between the Risky Asset and the Risk-Free Asset and Optimal Risky Portfolios; 2) Equilibrium in Capital Markets: Capital Asset Pricing Model, Single-Index and Multifactor Models, Arbitrage Pricing Theory and Market Efficiency; 3) Fixed-Income Securities: Bond Prices and Yields, Managing Bond Portfolios; 4) Equity Valuation Models; 5) Portfolio Performance Evaluation.

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程為訓練學生具有敏銳的觀察能力及細密的思考能力，以發現技職教育的相關問題，並擬定完善可行的研究計畫，遂行研究工作，經客觀分析程序，並作成研究論。課程內容括技職教育研究概論、研究設計、研究方法、取樣與量測、資料處理、報告撰寫。
description.en: This course is a survey of research methodology that is relevant to the technological education. It discusses how to design quantitative research, collect, and report the data. It also highlights the difference between quantitative research and qualitative research.

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生熟悉統計方法與理論，使能利用已知的資料，經由整理、分析並作成合理解讀，作為教育相關研究工具。課程內容包括機率、抽樣分配與估計，假設考驗，相關迥歸分析、變異數分析等。
description.en: This course is designed to equip students with ability to analyze and interpret experiments and surveys. Course contains include probability concept, sampling distribution, interval estimation, hypothesis testing and analysis of variance.

description.zh: 以傳統與革新的觀點探究技職教育方案評鑑的理論與實務，包括專有名詞、評鑑的規劃、評鑑取向、評鑑標準、評鑑倫理、評鑑人員、資料蒐集分析與解釋的方法、評鑑結果的報告及後設評鑑等相關議題。
description.en: Exploring the program evaluation theory and practice from both traditional and innovative point of view on Technical-Vocational Education, including: design evaluation plans, evaluation ethics, evaluation standard, evaluator, design tools for collecting data, conduct observations and interviews, interpret data, write reports, provide assistance in communicating findings to various stakeholder groups, and metaevaluation.

description.zh: 本課程在探討技職教育行政理論包括組織、領導、決策、溝通、效能研究等及其相關實務之研究。期培育學生分析當前技職教育行政問題，並研訂技職教育的改善措施。
description.en: The aims of the course are to explore the theory and practice of educational administration, especially the educational organization, leadership, decision making, communication, etc. Students are expected to apply related theory to analyze VTE issues after the class.

name.en: Administration of Vocational and Technological School

description.zh: 本課程在探討學校行政理論的歷史背景、學校社會系統理論、學校科層體制、學校氣氛、學校領導、決策、溝通理論、學校效能等，並以技職學校作為討論主軸。
description.en: This course is to guide students to explore the historical background of the theories of school administration; theories of school social system; school departmental hierarchy; school atmosphere; school leadership; theories of decision and communication; studies of school efficiency. Students are expected to apply related theory to analyze VTE issues after the class.

description.zh: 課程內容包括：生涯理念介紹、興趣、性格、價值觀探討、生涯決定因素、生涯技巧、生涯角色調適、生涯選擇與規劃技巧、生涯訪談、生涯高原調適、性別和職業歧視、雙生涯家庭、就業準備等主要生涯的研究與實作。
description.en: In-depth study of research in career development and guidance. Topics include an introduction to career idea, the exploration of interest, personality, and view of value, decision making of career, techniques of career development, adjustment of career role, choice and planning of career, interview, adjustment of career highness, adjustment of changing role, discrimination of gender and job, a family of two career parents, job preparation.

description.zh: 組織行為是採用分析的方法，了解研究解個體行為在個人、團體、組織三個層次中的行為表現，並應用相關學理知識提高組織效能，尤其將焦點放在如何提高員工的生產力、降低離職率與曠職率，增加滿意度等四個變項上。
description.en: Organizational behavior (OB) is a field of research that investigates the impact that individuals, groups, and structure have on behavior within an organization, and then it applies that knowledge to make organizations work more effectively.  Specifically, OB focuses on how to improve productivity, reduce absenteeism and turnover, and increase employee citizenship and job satisfaction.

description.zh: 探討網路教學與學習之相關原理，以及實務應用。內容包括有網路學習之優點、特性、限制、科技、媒體、平台、教材、教師角色與管理、學生角色與任務、實際案例、未來趨勢等。
description.en: To explore theories and practical application Web-based instruction and learning including WBL advantages, characteristics, limitations, technology, media, platforms, materials, teacher roles and management, student roles and tasks, practical cases, and future trends etc..

description.zh: 本課程檢視受到廣泛使用的主要教育評鑑模式，並熟悉教育評鑑模式的取向與實用技術。
description.en: This course is designed to review the most widely used model for educational evaluation, to conversant with approach and utility technique of evaluation models.

name.en: Philosophy of Technological and Vocational Education

description.zh: 本課程在探究技職教育的本質、目標、歷史發展及相關哲學思潮，期培養學生發展批判思考能力分析技職教育相關議題。
description.en: This course is designed to investigate the purpose, essence, history,    and related philosophical thinking of Vocational and Technological Technical Education (VTE)；to develop students forming critical thinking to analyze the current issues in VTE.

name.en: Theory and practice of Technical-Vocational Education

description.zh: 課程內容包括：技職教育的理論基礎、能力本位、建教合作、生計教育、職業輔導、技職課程與教學等理念與實務。
description.en: Course content include: theoretical foundations and developmental trends of technical and vocational education, competence-based instruction, cooperative education, career education, vocational guidance, technical and vocational education curriculum.

description.zh: 本課程之開課，在探索技職教育課程發展的學理，包括技職教育課程的意義﹑課程發展的基本原理及理論基礎，進而瞭解技職教育的類型及其發展模式，考量課程實施的各項條件，具備課程評鑑的觀念，最後能掌握技職教育課程的發展動向，同時對現行技職教育課程發展的實務問題，提出解決對策。
description.en: The course is designed to explore the rationale of curriculum development in technical-vocational education, including the concept of curriculum, theories of curriculum development, principles and models of curriculum development in technical-vocational education, and the problem of curriculum development in technical-vocational education in Taiwan.

description.zh: （一）瞭解人力資源發展之定義、內涵與功能；（二）培養進行人力資源發展之基本能力。課程內容包括：人力資源發展之定義與內涵、人力資源發展之需求評估、人力資源規劃、學習理論、訓練方法、教材編撰、訓練發展評量及國際化人力資源發展等。課程實施方法為講解、討論、參觀訪問及專題討論。
description.en: The course aims to (1) understand the definition, essence, and function of human resources development, (2) cultivate the fundamental capability of human resource development. It covers the definition and essence of human resources development, demand evaluation of human resource development, planning of human resource, learning theories, training method; curriculum designing and compilation, evaluation of training development, and international human resource development. The course is conducted through lectures, discussions, field trip activities, and colloquia.

name.zh: 教育訓練實施與績效評鑑

description.zh: 為了使訓練資源的更有效運用，本課程希望讓學生了解，企業內部在實施訓練之前，應客觀、嚴謹的加以評估，並追蹤其實施後的成效，以正確評估訓練的效益。
description.en: To make better use of the training resources, the curriculum expects to make students understand that any enterprise should objectively and carefully evaluate the training program before its employment, and keep track of its effect after its employment to make sure the effectiveness of the training program.

description.zh: 探討數位化課程網站的系統化設計方法與過程。內容包括課程網站的分析、規劃、設計、發展、測試、評估等，以及實際網站案例介紹等。
description.en: To explore systematic design methodologies and progress of figital course website analysis, planning, design, development, test, and evaluation, and practical cares of course website etc.

description.zh: 縱覽教育經濟學理論基礎，研習教育經濟研究方法論，主題探討包含:台灣經濟成功的要件，經濟政策與發展軌跡及高科技的挑戰，重要論點在於如何結合技職教育融入台灣新興產業要求。
description.en: Overview of theories and research methodology in the economics of education. Topics include elements of success economic policies, economic policies, economic development, and challenges of hi-tech era in Taiwan, and discussion of issues on what elements impact Taiwan's economic development and how to combine the technical-vocational education with the development of Taiwan's new industry.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

notes: 研一單號選蘇昭瑾 雙號選程耀毅

description.zh: 本課程是針對已修習一年的大學有機化學的同學，因此課程規劃成反應、機構與結構式等三個主要部分。修畢本課程的同學應已具有瞭解有機化學相關論文與研究成果的能力。
description.en: This course is designed for students who have taken one-year undergraduate organic chemistry course. It is divided into the three fundamental aspects of the study of organic chemistry:reactions, mechanisms and structure. A student who has completed this course should be able to approach the literature directry, with a sound knowledge of modern basic organic chemistry.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討高分子在溶液及固態時的物理化學現象及其應用。內容包括�溶液熱力學?高分子的微結構及定性。�溶液熱力學探討統計熱力學、晶格理論、Flory-Huggin理論、Flory-Krigbaum理論、相分離、θ-溫度、滲透壓、GPC測分子量、高分子膠體。?高分子之微結構包括有高分子之形狀、自由旋轉分子鏈距離、光散射、中子散射、排拒體積、碎形、霍氏光譜及核磁共振儀在高分子微結構之分析。
description.en: The course is to investigate the physical phenomena of macromolecules in the solution and solid state. It includes the solution thermodynamics and chemical microstructure of polymer chains.The solution thermodynamics is to study lattice theory, statistical thermodynamics, Flory-Huggin theory, Flory-Krigbaum theory, phase separation, θ-temperature, Osmometry, GPC, and polymer gels.Light scattering and Neutron scattering are used to characterize the polymer microstructure. Polymer radius of gyration, freely rotating chains, excluded volume, fractal, and scaling are also discussed. Finally, spectroscopy methods are used to study polymerization models and microstructure.

name.en: Analysis and Identification of Organic Materials

description.zh: 本課程包含材料的結構鑑定和材料的性質分析。材料的結構鑑定方法有：元素分析、吸收光譜法、振動光譜法、核磁共振光譜法、質譜法、x-射線光譜法和電子顯微鏡法。材料的性質分析包含：材料熱性質(DSC, TGA, TMA,DMA)和材料機械性質(伸張、壓縮、剪力強度等)。
description.en: The materials of the course include structure identification and property analysis of materials. Methods of structure identification  of materials are : elemental analysis, absorption spectroscopy, vibration spectroscopy, nuclear magnetic resonance spectroscopy, mass spectrometry, x-ray spectroscopy and electron microscopy. Metheds of property analysis of materials are : thermal properties of materials (DSC,TGA,TMA,DMA) and mechanical properties of materials (tensile, compression and shear strengths).

description.zh: 高分子流變學本課程以講述高分子流體之黏性及彈性為主。內容包括:(1) 黏彈性簡介(2)時間溫度轉換(3)非結晶區之玻璃轉移點(4)橡膠理論(5)黏彈模型(6)介電鬆弛等專題。
description.en: This course will extensively study the viscosity and elasticity of polymeric materials. The main contents include(1) Phenomenalogical Treatment of Viscoelasticity(2) Time-Temperature Correspondence(3) Transitions and Relaxation in Amorphous Polymers(4) Rubber Elasticity(5) Viscoelastic Models(6) Dielectric Relaxation

description.zh: 本課程探討液晶之形成原理及其在高科技之應用，其內容包括從液晶之熱力學探討液晶形成之原理，低分子量液晶在顯示器(STN LCD, TFT LCD)之應用，液晶配向膜，液晶補償膜，彩色濾光片之原理及應用，鐵電式液晶在光電之用途。最後研究主鏈和側鏈型的液晶高分子，如層列型、膽固醇型，這些材料在高科技及非線性光學上之發展。
description.en: The course is to elucidate the physics and chemistry of liquid crystal material. It includes application of liquid crystal as display derivces, liquid crystal display compensator, color filter, STN LCD, TFT LCD, and ferroelectric liquid crystals. Finally the potential application of the liquid crystal in nonlinear optics and high-tech industries will be discussed.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討界面的物理化學現象及其在高科技之應用。包括有(1) 表面及界面張力的分子理論(2)界面的作用力(3)表面及界面的熱力學(4)液體和固體界面的熱力學(5)表面及界面張力的測量(6)接觸角的測量(7)吸附的熱力學(8)分散液的穩定性(9)分散液分子間吸力及斥力(10)懸浮液之高分子穩定性(11)凝聚(12)界面科學在高科技及光電工業上之原理及應用。
description.en: This course is to elucidate the interfacial phenomena and its application in high-tech Industries. It includes (1)molecular theory of surface and interface (2)molecular interaction of interface (3)thermodynamics of surface and interfaces (4)thermodynamics of liquids in contact with solids (5)measurement of surface and interfacial tension (6)contact angle measurement (7)thermodynamics of adsorption (8)stability of dispersion (9)molecular interaction of dispersion (10)stability of suspension (11)flocculation(12)application of interface science in High-tech industries

description.zh: 介紹有機材料：如染料、界面活性劑、添加劑、單體、生物活性物質等之合成、性質、鑑定和應用等。
description.en: The material in this course covers fundamental and practical aspects of organic materials. The various types of organic materials such as dyestuffs, surfactants, additives, monomers and bioactive agents will be introduced. Syntheses, Properties, Characterization and applications are presented.

description.zh: 課程內容主要介紹無機化學研究過程中﹐所使用的各種物理方法。首先介紹光譜學之基本原理。隨後將較深入的探討應用在無機化學與固體材料上的各種光譜技術。包括：各種吸收光譜、核磁共振光譜、電子順磁共振光譜、Ｘ光吸收光譜及Ｘ光繞射等應用於化學之常用分析技術﹐也都包括在課程討論範圍之內。
description.en: I.                  General Introduction to SpectroscopyII.                 Group Theory III.               Absorption Spectroscopies --- UV-Vis, IR, Raman IV.               X-ray crystallography V.                 Bonding models in inorganic chemistryVI.               The structure and reactivity of moleculesVII.                    solid state

description.zh: 本課程的目的在介紹生物反應工程，也就是如何將工程原理應用在生物程序。本課程內容可分為二大部分：生物系統的概述與工程的原理應用，第一部分將包括細胞的結構、複製與生長，生物化學反應的種類及其特性，細胞的主要代謝路徑等，第二部分則探討生物反應器的種類及其操作特性與應用，生物反應器內的質傳、熱傳及流動型態，產品回收與純化。
description.en: The objective of the course is to introduce the fundamental concepts of bioprocess engineering, which is the application of engineering principles to design, develop, and analyze bioprocesses. The course will first survey the basics ideas from microbiology and biochemistry. Subsequently, the emphasis will be the application of engineering concepts to biological problems. The following topics will be included: enzyme kinetics, major metabolic pathways, cell growth, stoichiometry, bioreactor operation, and product recovery and purification.

description.zh: 本課程之目的將探討酵素的功能及結構。針對醣類水解?水解各式各樣的多醣類做詳細探討。將目前已歸類的96家族中有晶體結構的家族中選出幾種家族做詳細的學習。從已發表文獻中來瞭解水解?可特定水解多醣類的特性。
description.en: This course will focus on glycoside hydrolases that hydrolyze various carbohydrates. Glycoside hydrolases have been classified to 96 families to date. The number of enzymes will be increase by time.

description.zh: 介紹與醫學相關之醣類生物學
description.en: The course is designed to teach graduate students about the recent advances in glycobiology with medical and biotechnological applications. The prerequisite for the course is general biochemistry. Students are expected to learn the structure, biosynthesis, chemistry and cell biology in related to bioactive glycans.

description.zh: 研究生相較於大學期間訓練的最主要差別在於其必須從事個人的學術研究。因此，研究生須要資訊與洞察力以達成獲得較高學位之論文寫作能力。故本課程主要內容包括：  一、 研究的特性  二、 智慧收集-「什麼」的問題  三、 研究-「何故」的問題  四、 良好研究的特質  五、 研究的基本類型  六、 從事研究的技能  七、 研究倫理  八、 研究設計練習
description.en: The necessity for personal academic research is the key cultural change that postgraduate students will encounter compared with their undergraduate days. Thus, postgraduate students need information and insights to develop the capacity to operate successfully achieving a higher-level degree. To examine these concerns, the course includes:1. Characteristics of research2. Intelligence-gathering-the "what" questions3. Research-the "why" questions4. Characteristics of good research5. Basic types of research6. The craft of doing research7. Research ethics8. Research design practice

name.en: A Briefing on Architecture Design Course (I)

description.zh: 總課程目標：     在學員原有專業基礎上，增加其深度與廣度，包含自實質與非      實質環境之探討與實踐等之能力。 研一課程目標：          了解理論與實踐之理性關係，其對象應包含自實質至非實質環      境。 課程概要：     利用不同設計課題就學員原有專長實際操作其自理論至實踐之      因果關係。此階段較偏向對目標之了解，就各學員所選定課題      完成一設計成果及完整探討與實踐之過程書面資料，以接受目      標檢驗。
description.en: Goal for the Course :   Base on the professional knowledge, the disciples learn   to enhance the depth and width of ascertainment and   practice in both substantial and non-substantial   environments. 1st GradeThrough manipulation of different design topics,   the disciples learn to understand the relational   relationship between theory and practice in both   substantial and non-substantial environments. A complete   presentation which includes design result and a report of   the process of the ascertainment will be required for   evaluation.

description.zh: 本課程區分為四個實習，共一學年之都市設計實習，每學期應從事幾項實習，依該學期之情況而定：(一)大型基地開發之建築規劃與都市設計實習：參照台北市都市發展局擬定之「都市設計與土地使用開發許可」之審議標準，練習建築、敷地與都市設計三者整合關係之設計實習。(二)都市更新地區都市設計實習：以台北市更新地區為範例，選定基地範圍從事都市更新地區之改造，建立地區未來像，並擬定都市設計準則。(三)都市計畫通盤檢討地區都市設計實習：依據都市計畫通盤檢討第八條規定，都市計畫通盤檢討地區必須依據該地區之交通、產業、文化、生態及基地等因素，擬定都市設計準則；以台北市都市計畫通盤檢討為例，練習都市設計準則之訂定，或以都市計畫細部計畫為例，研擬土地使用分區管制與設計準則。(四)新發展區都市設計實習：選定一個地區，可能是擴大都市發展地區或新市鎮、新社區之規劃設計實習。
description.en: There are four exercises for one academic year. The exercises to be undertaken  depend on when and how it is appropriate:(1)	Exercise on building planning and urban design for large-scale land development project(2)	Exercise practice on urban design for district renewal planning(3)	Exercise of overall review district urban design out of the total urban design	(4)	Exercise on urban design for new development area

description.zh: 本課程為工程技術組必修，分為綠建築、建築構法、數位媒體、建築生產、建築在利用、環境控制等專題，每學期視任課老師專長輪流開設兩至三個專題，採用分組方式個別指導，每位學生必須修習兩個不同專題。本課程將針對建築實務中所面對之技術課題進行個案研究並模擬操作其設計至細部設計階段。
description.en: This is a design studio class, focused on the technical side for topics as Green Building, Building Systems, Digital Design Media, Building Production, Building Reuse, Environment Control, and others were be included. There will have only two or three topics in each semester, depends on the teacher's specialty, and each student needs take two topics in one year.

description.zh: 本課程主要在論述計畫於都市發展過程的干預以及維護環境永續發展之分派與管理角色，其內容包括：    一、 規劃、規劃師與計畫    二、 1800年到1900年的都市發展    三、 都市計畫的先驅著    四、 戰後規劃的開創    五、 國土與區域計畫    六、 都市與都市區域計畫    七、 歐美的都市計畫    八、 未來聚落的都市規劃
description.en: This course is mainly to discuss the role of planning as a form of intervention in the development process, and introduce the role of planning in the allocation and management of a sustainable environment. Thus the course including:    1. Planning, planners and plans    2. The origins: urban growth from 1800 to 1940    3. The seers: pioneer thinkers in urban planning, from        1880 to 1945    4. The creation of the postwar planning machine, from        1940 to 1952    5. National/regional planning from 1945 to 1990    6. Planning for cities and city regions from 1945 to        1990    7. Planning in Western Europe, United States since 1945    8. Settlements into the 21st century

name.en: Traditional architecture of Taiwan in Special Topics

description.zh: 本課程的目的是研究人與環境互動的關係，介紹環境心理學發展的過程及相關的理論。並藉由觀察與評估現有生活環境中的行為，增進我們對環境心理學中在理論與經驗上不同取向的瞭解。課程內容包括1.緒論2.研究方法及理論架構 3. 建成環境，由家環境到城市空間4.社會行為及實質環境5.自然環境與行為6.使用者用後評估7. 結論
description.en: The purpose of this course is to explore the interaction relationships between human and environment, introducing the development and theory of environmental psychology. Via observing and evaluating the behavior of present living environment, enhance our knowledge about environmental psychology through various approaches to theories and experiences. The course includes:1. Introduction  2. Research methods and theory framework 3. The built environment from home environment to city space 4. Social behavior and the physical environment 5. The natural environment and behavior 6. Post-occupancy evaluation 7. Conclusion

name.en: Regional Methodology on Landscape and Architecture

description.zh: 本課程以地域論述為中心講述有關知識體系的基礎和架構。第一部份涵蓋人文主義地理學、文化地景、以及存在主義及其支系的現象學等基礎；第二部份講授以上述知識論為主的地景和建築詮釋與實踐，包括城市規劃、建築和地景建築理論等範疇的相應，介紹地域論者如Lewis Mumford, Liane Lefaivre, Alexander Tzonis, Kenneth Frampton等人的觀點。第三部分為以台灣地區地域地景與建築思維的議題導向，進一步充實地域文化的空間-形式的智性思維。
description.en: This course is underpinned upon the epistemology of Regionalism that consisted of three parts. The first part traces back to Humanistic Geography, Cultural Landscape, Existentialism and its philosophical branch line-phenomenology, which are sources of the Regionalism. The second part is centered on interpretation and implementation in either landscape or architecture disciplines, in relation to the perspectives of city planning, architecture, and landscape architecture. And Regionalist advocates like Lewis Mumford, Liane Lefaivre, Alexander Tzonis, Kenneth Frampton and so on are included. The third part involves the regional issues by local-oriented issues of Taiwan. A few of cultural Space-From topics are introduced to substantiate intellectual understandings.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討台灣現行依據都市更新條例進行之都市更新實務之相關議題，透過理論與實務操作研討熟悉台灣都市更新操作機制及趨勢。主要內容包括如下：都市生命力再開發之契機與課題、都市再開發之目標、策略公部門執行都市更新之手段策略與課題民間團體執行都市更新之手段策略與課題現行都市更新手段之探討中國都市更新執行機制與成效都市更新規劃實務-都市更新概要計畫都市更新規劃實務-都市更新事業計畫都市更新規劃實務-容積獎勵之爭取（公共公益設施）日本推動都市再開發之相關配套措施（金融融資政策之探討）民間團體主辦都市更新與權利變換概說、不動產證卷化與信託
description.en: This course regards relative issues of urban revitalization implementation according to the Urban Renewal Act in Taiwan. This course consisted of several parts as below: Introduction of Urban Renewal Act the issues & strategies of Urban Renewal of government the issues & strategies of Urban Renewal of private sector the methods & strategies of urban renewalthe effects & authority of urban renewal in Mainland China the implementation of urban renewal-urban renewal brief the implementation of urban renewal-urban renewal planthe implementation of urban renewal-Floor Area Bonusthe implementation of urban renewal-Rights Concession plan he implementation of urban renewal-Investment Trust、Trust Funds

description.zh: 本課程主要在教導學生探討基本室內環境品質與人體健康間的關係，使學生具備創造健康室內環境的相關知識及操作能力，主要授課要點如下：1.以各種類型的建築室內環境為主題；2.探討人為環境與人體健康之關係；3.探討建築材料、構造與設備對室內環境各項因子之影響；4.學習室內環境品質量測儀器之操作與判讀能力；5.具備診斷與改善一般室內環境議題之相關專業知識及操作能力。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to discuss the relationship between Indoor Environment Quality and human healthy, and make sure our students can realize the knowledge of healthy environment and manage it.Contents：1. The indoor environment of different types of building.2. The relationship between the artificial environment and human health.3. Discuss the influence of the building material, construction and equipment on indoor environment.4. Learn to use the instrument to measure indoor environment quality.5. Learn to diagnose and improve indoor environment quality.

description.en: Case Study, Seminar, Group Meeting.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意本課程包括理論與實驗，由製科所教授共同開課。第一學期探討的範圍主要在製造技術，側重在與製造業相關之專業知識。.
description.en: This course includes theories and experiments, is conducted by several professors of institute of manufacturing technology. In first semester, topics covered are mainly in the field of manufacturing technology, emphasizing in professional knowledge of manufacturing industry.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意材料機械性質是強調材料巨觀性質與材料微觀結構, 鍵結及晶體結構之間的關係, 是一門實務性,基本且重要的課程。它包括彈性, 塑性行為, 差排理論, 單晶與聚晶材料之塑性變形, 複合材料, 高溫聚晶材料之變形, 非晶質材料之永久變形, 材料強化機構, 材料破壞, 潛變與氫脆性等問題之討論。
description.en: This course deals with the mechanical behavior of materials. It emphasizes the relationship among macroscopic properties, material microstructure, and fundamental concepts of bonding and crystal structure. Contents of this course include the elastic and elastic behavior , dislocation , plastic deformation in single and polycrystalline materials ,strengthening mechanism of crystalline materials, composite materials, high temperature of crystalline materials ,fracture , fatigue and embrittlement.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意包括變分法、積分方程式、延遲方程式、Green函數、高等複變。asymtotic展開，微擾法。
description.en: Including variation method, Integral equation, delay equation, Green function, asymtotic expansion, pertubation.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意一維系統的自由及強制振動多維系統的自由及強制振動自然頻率的計算與模態分析振動的控制振動量測與應用振動系統之數值分析方法非線性振動機構與動力傳動元件的振動分析
description.en: Free and Forced vibrations of Single Degree of Freedom Systems, Free and Forced vibrations of Multi-degree of Freedom Systems,  Determination of Natural Frequencies and Mode Shapes, Vibration Control, Vibration Measurement and Applications, Numerical Methods in Vibration Analysis, Non-liner Vibration, Vibration Analysis of Mechanisms and Power Transmission Elements.

description.zh: 此課程將介紹各種實驗之設計法及統計分析法，其中包括：單因子實驗 ，完全區集設計 ，不完全區集設計 ，多因子實驗 ，部份因子實驗 ，變異數分析 ，迴歸分析 ， 最佳化
description.en: Basic ideas of experimental design with applications; completely randomized design, randomized block design, estimation and tests, analysis of covariance for designed experiments; factorial experiments, incomplete block designs in general; determination of optimum factor combinations; basic ideas of optimal design.

description.zh: 課程內容包括：微細加工基本概念，傳統加工方式之比較，各種加工方式比較與市場分析， 微細放電加工， 微細超音波加工(超音波簡介與應用)， 微細電解加工與電解拋光， 鐳射加工於微細加工的應用， 微細探針加工法簡介，微細探針的應用， STM，AFM的應用與簡介。
description.en: Introduce the concepts of micromachining. compare and analyse micro machining method,   Micro-EDM, Micor-USM, ECM, Laser machining, Micro probes machining and applications, Introduction of STM，AFM.

description.zh: 課程內容包括：課程分為三部分，第一、接合技術之基礎：材料表面結構和接合力學。第二、介紹一般工程用接合技術：機械接合、銲接、銲接冶金、軟硬銲、金屬-陶瓷接合、擴散鍵結、和膠合。第三、接合應用：真空系統和微電子接合和密封結構介紹。
description.en: This course is divided into three sections. The first three chapters deal with those chapters which are the principles of joining, including: Introduction, Surface science, and The mechanics of joining. The next six chapters describe the engineering options currently available for the joining and assembly of the components of an engineering system, including: Mechanical bonding, Welding, Welding Metallurgy, Soldering & Brazing, Metal-Ceramic Joints & Diffusion Bonding, Adhesives, and Structural Adhesives. The last two chapters take two areas of special interest, vacuum system and microelectronics, and survey the range of resolutions to joining problems which have been developed for these specific application.

description.zh: 本課程的目的是協助研究生準備進行有關設計史、設計理論與設計評論等主題之碩士論文研究，與實務專題設計之創作理念與風格的理論探討，提供總體觀照設計思潮所需之理論縱深與歷史距離。課程內容以多元辨證方式，針對(1)各種設計思想與運動：現代主義與後現代主義、結構主義與後結構主義、資本主義與社會主義等，以及(2)各派設計論述：行為派、系統派、認知派、語言派、歷史派、社會派等。
description.en: The objective of this course is to help graduate students to prepare their master's theses that are related to design history, theories and criticism, or to review related design concepts and styles for their graduate projects. This course provides the necessary theoretical perspectives and historical distances and its contents contain pluralism-oriented reflections of (1) design thoughts and movements: modernism and post-modernism, structuralism and post-structuralism, capitalism and socialism, and (2) design discourses: behavioral research, systematic science, cognitive science, linguistics, history, sociology, and alternative design).

description.zh: 以親人性、創造力跨科際整合的設計思維，對設計知識與專業技能之理論及實務，從文獻探討、理論專研、實務案例等深入淺出，培養設計專業領域相關知能、洞見和體認，期能對設計相關問題解決，提出整合、創新、前瞻之具體可行方案。
description.en: In an age of rapid social, technological and cultural change, we need a new kind of design professional who is able to bring the creativity, innovation, flexibility and knowledge needed to exploit new opportunities and make things happen. Through literature review, theoretical study, and case study, this course provides design related competence and new insights, in terms of tacit knowledge, ideation, humane, and interdisciplinary thinking.

description.zh: 工業設計在產品開發上，係一多元素、多因素組合的系統性與整合性工作，其在企業內執行的成敗，關鍵在於：(1)企業組織體系是否能有效應用工業設計的功能，(2)設計部門是否能有效管理控制本身的設計品質，(3)設計行政事務工作(包括人事資料、材料及日程進度等)是否能有效率的管理與執行。因此本課程旨在研究探討設計專業上的高階之管理知識與技能，課程內容包含(1) 設計功能的管理、(2) 設計品質的管理、與(3) 設計行政的管理，課程並輔以實例專案研討驗證。
description.en: Industrial design is an integral activities with in product development. It's effect in organization depends on; 	1.The understanding and the applying of industrial design from    	  the TOP management organization.2.The management of design quality with in the design function. 	3.The efficiency and the effectiveness of design administration.Therefore, the content of this Special will including the theory and practice of 1.The management of design function.2.The management of design quality.3.The management of design administration.

description.zh: 數位革命時代的來臨，CAD/CAE/CAM/PDM也是資訊科技的產物，相關技術的整合與應用已普遍實踐於產品開發，藉由資訊科技建立「資料一元化」的數位設計環境，打破傳統產品開發的溝通障礙與隔閡，整合跨機能的設計團隊，達成「同步工程」的理想，才能因應全球產業快速的變革。電腦輔助技術不僅是新的設計工具，其更深層的意義是產品開發體系的整體運作與管理方式也受到此一新技術影響，需有合理合適的管理架構與設計程序配合，才能有效運用，創造出其應有的價值。本課程將先探討資訊科技的原理與發展趨勢，以及分析產品設計模式與設計活動的特質，進而瞭解資訊科技對產品開發的衝擊與影響；然後以實際案例透過數位化設計技術，有效縮短產品開發時程，實現同步工程的理想。
description.en: Information technology, which brings many changes to the commercial and industrial activities, makes the digital revolution happen in the recent era. In the field of product development, information technology through computer-aided design has been very influential as well, which has not only replaced traditional tools, but also altered the design procedures. The aim of this course is to study the method of product development in a concurrent engineering. In this course, the first theme is to review information technology and product development process to comprehend the impact of CAD on product development. The other theme, by the project practice, is to implement the techniques of concurrent engineering using CAD/CAM system on product development.

Course contents: Class and object, message passing, inheritance, composition, virtual methods and polymorphism, templates,  object-oriented languages and environments, term project.

description.en: The objective of this course is to provide students with a full awareness of the knowledge and technologies of software engineering. description.zh: 永續發展是妥善規劃與管理自然資源之最高指導原則，因此本課程﹙一﹚依此宗旨討論水資源保育、固廢管理與空氣污染控制；更將以實際例將面向擴及科技與社經整合層次，以期落實理論於實際應用之中。
description.en: This is intented as a brief introduction to the subject of the substainable development of natural resource. Main subject are water conservation, solid waste management and air pollution control. Many overall regional case studies will be discussed. It must be technologic, economic and social environmental change or a new factural data are developed

name.en: Planning and Management for Air Quality

description.zh: 以都會區空氣品質為範圍，配合污染源類別﹙粒狀物，SOx， NOx， VOC， THC及O3﹚，本課程從逸散性、固定污染性、移動污染性等不同方向，以講述空品之規劃與管理等問題。此包括PSI指標與空品特性分析，及減目標與管制策略之研訂等。
description.en: The course gives a brief introduction to planning and management for air quality. The main contents are focused on fugitive pollution, stationary, and movable sources. Index of pollution standard will be also discussed in the course.

name.en: Environmental Economics and Environmental Policies Analysis

description.zh: 政策研究能檢視理論和實務的切合程度。本課程將帶領大家認識環境政策的經濟分析方法，學習經濟的思維觀點，以及如何運用經濟方法瞭解解決環境問題。除此之外上課內容並與法律結合，探討環境法的經濟分析觀點和傳統思維有何不同，尤其是對環境行為上之改變效果。希望學生能夠具體瞭解經濟分析方法幫助政府解決環境問題及規劃環境政策時所扮演的角色。
description.en: There is a significant trade-off between economic growth and environmental quality.  From this course, students will learn fundamental concepts in Environmental Economics and how to analyze environmental policy issues by using economic tools.  In additions, this course combines economic analysis to law, especially shows students how regulations affect people's behavior.  After this class, students not only know how economic approaches help the government deal with environmental issues and the differences between theory and practices.

description.zh: 由於台灣地小人稠,為了更有效利用土地,達到更高之生產量,使得土壤污染問題特別顯得重要,因此整治土壤污染是刻不容緩.本課程對於土壤污染之整治由萃取,氣提,固定安定化,淋洗,電熔等物化方法傳授之,其次講授生物復育技術,最後以工程經濟角度,進行本益比分析。.
description.en: There are many remediate methods in this class.The methods include solvent extraction,air stripping,solidification/stabilization,solid flushing,and thermel treatment.This f topicalso includes bioremediation and cost effective analysis.

description.zh: 本課程之主旨在於加強學生對水質化學之深入了解，以作為進一步對水質管理應用之基礎。課程內容包括高等平衡化學、高等複合化學、高等氧化還原化學在於薄膜處理、離子交換、吸附處理及高級消毒處理程序之應用
description.en: This class will provide graduate student authoritative information on the current knowledge of water chemistry, water quality and water quality control.  The topic will include the applications of Chemical equilibrium, Redox reaction and coordination chemistry on water treatment processes such as CSF, membrane, GAC, Ion exchange and disinfection processes.

description.zh: 氣膠為懸浮在空氣中的微小固體或液體粒子。本課程深入探討氣膠科學（微塵學）及其工程上之應用。．氣膠理化特性，粒徑分布．氣膠運動學：擴散和布朗運動，過濾機制，荷電性質，熱泳等．光學特性及其應用．氣膠的測量原理與方法．大氣氣膠及生物氣膠
description.en: ．Indroduction:characterization of aerosols,shape and size distributions．Particle transport:Brownian motion and diffusion, centrifugation, intertia and filtration, convective diffusion,extermal forcr fields, thermal force．Optical properties:visibility, light scattering．Aerosol dynamics:coagulation, formation and growth．Atmospheric Aerosois and Bioaerosols．Measurement of aerosol

description.zh: 本課程之教學目的，在使學生對污水系統有整體之設計概念，使其未來在實務工作時，了解如何著手進行設計一具水準、經濟、高效益之污水下水道系統。課程內容包括：1.污水下水道系統規則  2.管線系統設計 3.抽水設施設計 4.污水處理方法之選擇 5.污水處理設施(除油、攔污、沈砂)設計 6.初沈池設計 7.各種生物處理法設計 8.終沈池、浮除設計 9.三級處理設計 10.污泥濃縮設計 11.污泥消化設計 12.污泥脫水、焚化設計 13.污水處理廠配置設計 14.污水處理廠水力計算 15.污水處理機械設備及儀控系統選擇 16.污水處理廠機械動力設計 17.污水處理廠附屬設備設計
description.en: This course provides a general designing concept of wastewater treatment system, and makes student to understand how to make a design of wastewater treatment system, which combine quality, economizatin and high efficiency. The contents of the course include:rules of sewerage system, design of pipe system, design of pumping ststem, design of the facilities of sewage treatment, unit operation and unit process design of biological unit system, and design of advanced sewage treatment.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在介紹嵌入式系統設計之基本原理與方法,以使學生瞭解如何使用軟/硬體元件來設計嵌入式系統。課程內容包含:1.嵌入式系統之基本介紹2.客戶單一目的處理器(硬體)3.通用型處理器(軟體)4.標準單一目的處理器(周邊)5.記憶體6.介面7.設計實例-數位相機及PDA 8.IC設計技術9.設計方法10.ARM嵌入式微處理器之介紹11.ARM嵌入式微處理器之應用12軟硬體共同設計簡介13.SOC嵌入式系統簡介
description.en: The objective of this course is to introduction a methodology and theory of embedded system design.Then student can using hardware/software components to design an embedded system. The content of this course are shown as follows:1.An Introduction to Embedded System. 2.Custom Single-Purpose Processor:Hardtware. 3.General Puprose Processor:Software  4.Standard  Single-Purpose Process:Peripherals 5.Memory 6.Interfacing 7.Example-Digital Camera and PDA 8.IC Technology 9.Design Technology  10.ARM Embedded Microprocessor 11.ARM Embedded Microprocessor Applications 12. Introduction to Hardware/Software Co-Design 13. Introduction to Embedded System of System-on Chip

description.zh: 本課程以講授計算機網路中實體層、媒體存取控制與邏輯連結層為主。在實體層中，將討論到幾種目前廣泛使用的實體媒介。在媒體存取控制上，則討論乙太網路，記號匯流排與記號環網路為主。在邏輯連結層上，主要討論路由器用的路由協定為主。
description.en: The main subjects of this course include physical layer, media access control and logic link layer.  Popular physical layer medias are discussed first.  Media access control sub-layer that includes Ether-Net, Token Bus and Token Ring are the main subjects in the second portion.  Routing protocol used by routers are discussed in third portion of this course.

name.zh: 嵌入式即時多工核心開發與應用
name.en: The Development and Application of Embedded Multitasking Real-time Kernel

description.zh: 本課程在使學生認識嵌入式即時多工核心，瞭解其架構，並學習嵌入式即時多工核心之設計與相關應用技術。內容包含：(1)嵌入式系統介紹，(2)即時多工系統觀念介紹，(3)即時多工核心運作方式，(4)工作管理，(5)時間管理，(6)記憶體管理，(7)事件管理，(8)於嵌入式系統建制即時多工核心。
description.en: This course let students to understand the embedded multitasking real-time kernel.  They will parse the structure of multitasking real-time kernel; learn the skill to design the embedded multitasking real-time kernel and the application technology.  The contents of this course are: (1)Embedded system introduction, (2)Multitasking real-time concept, (3)Kernel structure, (4)Task management, (5) Time management, (6)Memory management, (7) Event management, (8)Real-Time kernel porting.

name.en: Machine Vision and Image Processing Algorithm

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹機器視覺之基本觀念與系統設計、組成機器視覺系統之元件 (攝影機、鏡頭及照明設備等)、重要之照像幾何學與立體測量法，同時介紹二位元影像處理、視覺對準法則、相機校正法、計算視覺與打光技術等重要基礎知識，配合影像處理演算法之介紹，使學員建立完整之機器視覺基礎與概念。(本課程參考麻省理工學院(MIT)之開放式課程)將包含下列主題:o 影像之形成 (Image Formation)o 視覺系統設計 (Vision System Design)o 移動中視覺 (Motion Vision)o 陰影成像法 (Shape from Shading)o 二位元影像處理 (Binary Image Processing)o 照像測量法 (Photogrammetry)o 立體影像 (Stereo Vision)o 對準法則 (Object Representation Alignment)o 相機校正法 (Camera Calibration)o 計算視覺 (Computational Vision)o 打光技術 (Optical Illumination)o 機器視覺之應用 (Applications to robotics and intelligent machine
description.en: This subject provides an introduction to the process of generating asymbolic description of an environment from an image and the fundamentals ofmachine vision and image processing techniques. Lectures include the followingtopics:※ The physics of image formation,※ Vision System Design,※ Motion vision,※ Recovering shapes from shading,※ Shape from Shading,※ Binary image processing,※ Photogrammetry,※ Stereo Vision,※ Object representation alignment,※ Camera Calibration,※ Computational vision,※ Optical Illumination,※ Applications to robotics and intelligent machine interactionTextbook:Horn, Berthold K. description.en: This course includes the propagation of light, the vectorial nature of light, coherence and interference, multiple-beam interference, diffraction, optics of solids, thermal radiation and light quanta, optical spectra, and ray optics.

Tests of film properties and its characterizations such as SEM, EDX, XRD, and metallurgical microscope are also be examined.1.Experiment on V-I characteristics of photonic devices.2.C-V measurements of optoelectronic devices.3.Measurements of photoconductivity and minority-carrier lifetime of photonic materials.4.Lab on Michelson interferometer5.Lab Experiment on diffraction 6.Lab on polarization7.Lab on spectrometer

description.en: Optical elements, optical systems, elements of precision machinery, precision mechanical systems, optical machinery design and case study.

description.zh: 先修課程：電磁學、工程數學、近代物理。  由電磁學之理論推導光波在光導波管之運行、偶合及調變，並經由近代物理之量子論介紹雷射理論及光偵測器原理。經由雷射之電光調變、光導波管之電場調制與光偵測器之光電轉換，將積體光學之基本概念完整介紹，並針對其特性及應用，加以說明。
description.en: From the electromagnetic theory, the optical waves propagation, coupling, and modulating in optical wave-guides are proposed. Also from the quantum theory introduced by modern physics, the laser theory and the principles of photo detectors are introduced. By the concepts of electro-optical modulation of laser devices, electrical modulation of optical wave-guides, and the opto-electronic conversion of photo detector devices, the fundamental concepts of integrated optics are introduced. Also the characteristics and applications of integrated optics are presented.

description.zh: 本課程主要提供學生在生物化學上幾個選擇性主題較深的知識。包括:蛋白質結構和功能、蛋白質輸送、蛋白質分解、接受器、生物膜、生物代謝和基因調控、人類疾病的生物化學及分子生物和生物技術。
description.en: This course provides students with a depth of knowledge of a number of selected topics in biochemistry. It Including of protein structure and function; protein transport; protein degradation; receptors; biological membranes; bioenergetics including photosynthesis; metabolic and genetic regulation;; biochemistry of human diseases and the techniques that underpin the developments of molecular biology and biotechnology.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 本課程之主要目的是介紹生物程序之必需知識給傳統化學工程大學部畢業生。生物程序是應用工程原理，採用生物催化劑來設計、發展化工程序。這些程序有許多應用，諸如生產化合物或分解破壞有害的物質。工程的知識，尤其是化學工程是成功拓展地生物程序所必須的。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to introduce the essential knowledge of bioprocess to traditional chemical engineers. Bioprocess engineering is the application of engineering principles to design, develop, and analyze processes using biocatalysts. These processes may result in the production of desirable compounds or in the destruction of unwanted or hazardous substances. The knowledge of the engineering, particularly the chemical engineering, will be essential to the successful exploitation of bioprocesses.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹如何利用X-光晶體繞射方法、NMR、電子顯微鏡、生物分子電腦模擬技術，以獲得生物大分子的三維結構，並探討其在生物科技上的應用。
description.en: The aim of this course is to introduce how to construct three-dimensional macromolecule structures by using X-ray diffraction, NMR, EM and computer simulation methods. Meanwhile, its applications to biotechnology will also be covered.

description.zh: 本課程說明如何利用質量及動量守恆建立可以描述速度、應力及壓力等流體系統物理量間關係之統制方程式。其內容包括：線及角動量守衡、應力張量、平滑近似理論、非穩態流動、邊界層近似法、線性穩定度理論及紊流系統。
description.en: We will learn how fundamental principles such as conservation of mass and momentum lead to equations that govern or describe the interrelationships of velocity, stress, pressure, and so on. Content includes macroscopic balance for linear and angular momentum, the stress tensor, lubrication approximation, unsteady flow、the boundary layer approximation, linear stability theory, and turbulent flows.

description.zh: 基本熱傳機構，穩態與非穩態熱傳導其包括有內部熱源之系統。內部及外部之強制及自然對流。表面及氣體間之輻射。利用因次方法及邊界層來考量熱傳。
description.en: Basic heat transfers mechanisms. Steady and unsteady conduction, including system with internal heat sources. Internal and external forced and free convection. Radiation between surfaces and in gases. Dimensional and boundary layer consideration.

description.zh: 本課程內容包括以分子熱力學的觀點來推導狀態方程式與活性係數模式，及有關相平衡的應用，統計熱力學原理亦將一併介紹。
description.en: The contents of this course include deriving the equation of state and the activity coefficient model based on the viewpoint of molecular thermodynamics and its application in phase equilibrium, and the principles of statistical thermodynamics will be also introduced.

description.zh: 本課程綜合介紹電化學之原理，電化學程序和反應器之輸送理論、操作和設計，並介紹相關之電化學工業。
description.en: This course involves three parts: the comprehensive introduction to principles of electrochemistry,the transport theory, design and operation of electrochemical processes and reactors, and the related electrochemical industries.

name.zh: 半導體材料檢測技術及原理

description.zh: 本課程將探討半導體材料之表面化學性質之分析技巧、以及界面和分子間引力之量測方法、表面形態分析、晶相結構分析以及電磁性質量測之技術和其原理。並配合半導體旋轉塗佈機和濺鍍機所備製之薄膜﹐實際操作FTIR顯微鏡、原子力顯微鏡、微量材料流變儀。
description.en: This course will present the techniques and their corresponding theories on the surface property measurements including chemical information, stress analysis, morphology, crystalline structure and intermolecular forces between interfaces. The course also includes a practical training on the FTIR microscope, atomic force microscope, reology meter on the semiconductor materials.

description.zh: 本課程主要是開設給已經修過"粉体工程"的學生，進階對粉体科學中粒子的物理與化學性質，成堆粉末的構造特性，力學、熱學、電學、光學等的性質，粉体群與流体間的運動現象與關係，以及粉粒的生成與消滅的過程與變化等做深入的說明，讓學生有更進一步對粉体的認識。

description.zh: 熱分析課程是闡述熱學基礎原理(熱力學,不可逆熱力學及動力學)以及其操作技巧;這包括:熱學.差示熱分析,熱量學,熱力學分析,熱膨脹以及熱失重分析。本課程適合大四及研一生。
description.en: The course of thermal analysis is described starting with its theories (thermodynamics, irreversible thermodynamics, and kinetics) and covering the basic techniques: thermometry, differential thermal analysis, calorimetry,thermo mechanical analysis and dilatometry, and thermogravimetry.This course is suitable for the senior undergraduate and beginning graduate students.

description.zh: 超硬材料是一種越來越普及的新興材料。超硬材料可以作成精密加工工具及多種高價值產品。是提升一國競爭力不可或缺的尖端材料。超硬材料包括鑽石及立方氮化硼。本課程將介紹世界各國最先進製造超硬材料方法，包括超高壓技術及鑽石膜技術。而目前日新月異之超硬材料之發展及應用，亦作進一步介紹。
description.en: This course is to introduce the Hard materials.

description.zh: 本課程在討論生醫工程之性質與應用在整形外科,骨科和牙醫界。課程內容包括生醫工程之發展,牙醫材料之應用,複合材料在生醫工程之應用,生醫陶瓷,生醫材料之腐蝕機制以及生醫材料之工程問題。
description.en: The topics of this course include the engineering of bio-materials, and their applications in the orthopedic and dental fields. description.zh: 地球自生成以來，其組成與結構一直在改變。今日的岩體即是這種長期改變的結果。地質學是研究岩體組成與結構變化的科學，目的在於掌握這種變化的軌跡，而構造地質學是地質學裡專門研究岩體結構變化的一分科。所謂的岩體結構（即地質構造）是指一個岩體的形狀、尺寸及其內部組成顆粒的排列情形。要了解結構的變化，無論是定性或定量，先要了解岩體的原始結構，從而才能了解現在所觀察到的岩體結構是否發生過變化。雖然構造地質學的目的是由現在既成的結構去了解地球的結構變化，但是就現在地球的結構，我們所能觀察到的岩體結構，大多被植生或土壤所覆蓋，即使偶有露出，也僅是其立體結構的某一表面而已，因此如何利用這些零星有限且是平面的岩體結構去推論地殼整體的結構，是必須首先解決的問題。面對這樣的問題，研究構造地質學應從大處著眼、小處著手，先從了解一個地區某一個露頭的現在結構開始，並由理論及實驗所得的結果推論這個岩體的結構變化過程，再由這些零星露頭的結構及其結構變化過程的資料，去推論、去拼湊涵蓋這些露頭地區的結構，由點而線、由線而面，終而包括整個地殼。本課程為構造地質學的進階課程，主要討論以下之主題：岩石的力學性質與變形行為、應變分
description.en: Structural geology is a branch of earth science. It has developed rapidly over the past decade. The reason for the recent advances in structural geology has been the realization that naturally deformed rocks seen in field outcrops contain a fantastic range of small-scale features which relate directly to large-scale orogenic deformation systems. The other reason has been the realization that rock deformation, like any other form of deformation, obeys well-defined physical and chemical laws. Base on this situation, this course is intended to serve as an accompaniment to techniques-based courses in structural geology or as an accompaniment to the laboratory portion of a postgraduate course. Systematic study of this advanced structural geology course includes several topics: mechanic proporties and deformation behaviors of rocks, strain analysis, ductile geologic structures, brittle geologic structures, and applied structural geology.

description.en: 1.Ideal Transmission line Fundamentals2.Crosstalk3.Nonideal Interconnect Issues4.Connectors, Packages, and Vias5.Nonideal Return Paths, Simultaneous Switching Noise and Power Delivery6.Electronic Circuits Simulations

description.zh: 本課程係提供本系同學消防設備與法規方面之基礎，以為將來投身防火工程時之重要技能，其課程內容包含:消防與建築法規、滅火設備、警報設備、避難逃生設備、消防搶救上之必要設備等。
description.en: The objective of this course is to introduce the protection of fire engineering， It will cover: code of building and fire-fighting、outfire facilities、warning  message facilities 、refuge facilities and fire-fighting santch facilities etc.

name.en: Special Topics on Urban Disaster Prevention

description.zh: 介紹國內外"都市防災基本計畫"之沿革，內容；探討都市防災之規劃，設計；都市更新（災後重建）中防災的課題；防災生活圈與防災據點之設立原則。
description.en: Introduce the "Urban precaution basis plan"of Taiwan and other countries; Study the subjects regarding to city renewing or reduiding after the caution;discuss the principles to set up the living zones and preecaution bases for urban disaster prevention.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討土木工程施工品質的內容，並藉由諸如統計品管，QC七大手法，ISO9000等品管技能與精義，探討改進工程品質，防止土木災害的相關技術。
description.en: This course will discuss the construction quality of civil engineering in detail.Form the learning of statistical quality,QC seven tools and ISO 9000,students can understand how to improve the quality and prevent the accident of civil engineering.

name.en: Special Topics of Disaster Prevention and Civil Engineering

description.zh: 本課程之內容主要訓練學生獨立思考，培養學生對土木防災之認識，進而學習土木工程在防災上的應用，並進行專題報告、專題演講及研究小組討論。
description.en: This course is trying to train independent thinking, to cultivate understanding precaution of civil engineering for students. This course is also learning the application of precaution of civil engineering. In the class we have case study, seminar, and group meeting.
